title: Air Max 2016
subtitle: Men's running shoes
description1: Internal bootie wraps your foot for a sock-like fit
description2: Unique eyestays work with the Flywire cables to create an even better glove-like fit
description3: Waffle outsole for durability and multi-surface traction
description4: Sculpted Cushlon midsole combines plush cushioning and springy resilience for impact protection
